Uses of Class
de.iabg.mesh.NodeCorrelationMatrix

Packages that use NodeCorrelationMatrix
de.iabg.mesh   
 

Uses of NodeCorrelationMatrix in de.iabg.mesh
 

Methods in de.iabg.mesh that return NodeCorrelationMatrix
 NodeCorrelationMatrix NodeMatrix.computeDistanceCorrelation(NodeMatrix nodes)
          Computes a matrix of the distances between each node in this NodeMatrix and the given NodeMatrix.
 NodeCorrelationMatrix NodeMatrix.getReducedDistanceCorrelation(NodeMatrix nodes, KeyList firstNodeKeys, KeyList lastNodeKeys)
          Makes a copy of this NodeMatrix and the given one, sorts each by the corresponding given node names, and computes the resulting NodeCorrelationMatrix.
 

Constructors in de.iabg.mesh with parameters of type NodeCorrelationMatrix
NodeCorrelationMatrix(NodeCorrelationMatrix correlation)
          Constructs a copy of the given NodeCorrelationMatrix.
